A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There is every chance\, that on repeat viewings\, this will pass Empire Strikes Back as my favourite AND the best Star Wars film.  We'll see\, but it had layers\, some great performances and was a hell of a lot of fun.

Wherever it ends up\, it's a very good film and Carrie Fisher (R.I.P.)  \, she went in style. 

Great film. (Oh and once more if yo're a Rebels fan\, you'll get even more out of this.
